description: These vibrant green oat muffins make a fun addition to any lunchbox.
keywords: Savoury muffin,Pescatarian,Halal,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Spinach, Banana & Oat Muffins Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pre-heat the oven to 180°C/160°C fan-forced. Line a muffin tin with cupcake cases or grease with a little bit of oil.
Add all the ingredients into a blender and blend on high for 1-2 minutes until no spinach leaves remain and the mix is vibrant and completely smooth.
Pour the batter into the muffin tin and bake for 22 minutes, until a skewer comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and the muffin tin and allow to cool before serving.
